BasicInfo.short: Vuze is a BitTorrent client used to find, download, share, play, view, and read content on digital devices.

Products.name: Vuze Leap
Products.description: Vuze Leap simplifies and streamlines the torrent protocol experience. It features a re-designed user interface that’s modern, sophisticated
